room_title: Escape room "Bootleggers’ Den" by The Tower Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: Bootleggers Den was a great game and the game master was awesome. Worked through everything without any major issues. Everything worked. 10/10 experience and will go back to try other games.

room_title: Escape room "Bootleggers’ Den" by The Tower Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: the guide was very friendly and helpful and the escape room itself was great too!

room_title: Escape room "Bootleggers’ Den" by The Tower Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: My sister took me (and siblings and spouses) here as a birthday present. It was so much fun! We went through the Bootlegger’s Den, it was a challenge, but not to the point of frustration. We’ll definitely go again to try out the other escape rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Bootleggers’ Den" by The Tower Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: Wow! This was a first for our group of 5. It kept the interest of all of us which was 4 generations! We did the "Bootleggers' Den" and definitely plan to do another escape. Our host was, well, a great host. I think he was almost as excited as we were when we escaped with 10 min to spare!  The puzzles definitely made us think and work together.  Great activity to do with out of town company.
